indications:
Indications prophylaxis of angina; adjunct in congestive
heart failure
name: ISOSORBIDE MONONITRATE Modified release
breadcrumbs: 2.6 Nitrates, calcium-channel blockers, and other antianginal drugs
doses:
Initially 20 mg 2–3 times daily or 40 mg
twice daily (10 mg twice daily in those who have not previously received
nitrates); up to 120 mg daily in divided doses if required
